itemDescription: Scottish medical doctor, former chair of BMA Scotland

wikipedia_page.main: Brian Douglas Keighley  (21 May 1948 – 9 November 2015) was a Scottish medical doctor who worked as a general practitioner (GP) and was the chair of the Scottish Council of the British Medical Association (BMA) from 2009 to December 2014.

response: *Brian Keighley, 67, Scottish physician and medical unionist (BMA).Shock at sudden death of former BMA Scotland chairman Brian Keighley
